item.title: Eric add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Eric add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Eric add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Either give me more wine or leave me alone." -- Rumi

item.title: Eric add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Eric add a quote by Omar Khayyam
item.description: "Today is the time of my youth I drink wine because it is my solace; Do not blame me, although it is bitter it is pleasant, It is bitter because it is my life." -- Omar Khayyam

item.title: Eric add a quote by Omar Khayyam
item.description: "Drink wine. This is life eternal. This is all that youth will give you. It is the season for wine, roses and drunken friends. Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life." -- Omar Khayyam

item.title: Eric add a quote by Aristophanes
item.description: "Quickly, bring me a beaker of wine, so that I may wet my mind and say something clever." -- Aristophanes

item.title: Eric add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Eric add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "My life is a rather grim one. One day I shall perhaps describe it to you in great detail." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Eric add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Life is short, Break the Rules. Forgive quickly, Kiss SLOWLY. Love truly. Laugh uncontrollably And never regret ANYTHING That makes you smile." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eric add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers. And you will know I am the Lord when I lay my vengeance upon you" -- Anonymous

item.title: Eric add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Eric add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Eric add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Eric add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Eric add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Eric add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Eric add a quote by Louis Pasteur
item.description: "A bottle of wine contains more philosophy than all the books in the world." -- Louis Pasteur

item.title: Eric add a quote by Jay McInerney
item.description: "Bottles of wine aren't like paintings. At some point you have to consume them. The object in life is to die with no bottles of wine in your cellar. To drink your last bottle of wine and go to sleep that night and not wake up." -- Jay McInerney

item.title: Eric add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Too much of anything is bad, but too much good whiskey is barely enough." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eric add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "What is better than to sit at the end of the day and drink wine with friends, or substitutes for friends?" -- James Joyce

item.title: Eric add a quote by Johann Heinrich Voss
item.description: "He who loves not wine, women and song remains a fool his whole life long" -- Johann Heinrich Voss

item.title: Eric add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eric add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Eric add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eric add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Eric add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Eric add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Eric add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Eric add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde
